alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 9:14PM PST until November 30 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Above 4000 feet, snow accumulations between 1 to 2 feet. Below 4000, total snow accumulations 8 to 14 inches. * WHERE...Leavenworth, Plain, Stehekin, Stevens Pass, Mazama, Twisp, Winthrop, Conconully, Holden Village, Methow, and Loup Loup Pass. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions Wednesday. Check pass conditions before attempting to travel through the Cascades on Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
